Cross-validating custom functions


Loading libraries
```{r}
library(cvms)
library(groupdata2)    # fold()
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)         # kable() : formats the output as a table
library(e1071)         # svm()

set.seed(1)
```

Parallelization
```{r}
library(doParallel)
registerDoParallel(4)
```

Data Preparation
```{r}
data <- participant.scores
data$diagnosis <- factor(data$diagnosis)

data <- fold(data, k=3, cat_col = "diagnosis", id_col="participant", num_fold_cols = 5, parallel = TRUE)

data <- data %>% arrange(participant)

data %>% head(12) %>% kable()
```
